Name: Eclipse Cocktail (by Leo Robitschek)
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Del Maguey Vida Clásico Mezcal
Instructions: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice). FLOAT mezcal on surface of drink.
Review: Beautifully balanced bitter-sweetness with tequila and mezcal sitting harmoniously with cherry and aperitivo liqueurs, with lemon freshness. A perfect aperitivo cocktail.
History: The colour of the moon during an eclipse inspired the name of this rusty-orange-red cocktail. In Jim Meehan & Chris Gall's 2011 The PDT Cocktail Book , the creation of the Eclipse is credited to " Leo Robitschek , New York, Winter 2009 ."
Nutrition: One serving of Eclipse Cocktail (by Leo Robitschek) contains 214 calories
